LanguageData.RoofOverlayReload: Any setting-change will require a reload of the save to have effect
LanguageData.RooOverlayThickRoofRed: Red overhead mountain in roof overlay
LanguageData.RooOverlayThickRoofRedTip: Use red color to show thick roof (overhead mountain) in roof overlay
LanguageData.RooOverlayConstructedRoofYellow: Yellow constructed roof in roof overlay
LanguageData.RooOverlayConstructedRoofYellowTip: Use yelow-ish color for constructed (not-natural) roof in roof overlay
